i highly recommend watching the anime before playing this as it skips through a lot of the story that the anime had in it however this game is 100 worth playing if you enjoy jrpgs and the fairy tail anime  combat is very satisfying and overall not as punishing as jrpgs tend to be  unlocking characters and completing requests tend to be enjoyable and not tedious  looking forward to ft2
